name: Jamie The Stickman
description:
Jamie is an adventurer, drawn by a child, for everyone to enjoy. He tries to help the  children find a new home in his cabin in the woods. Jamie has fun searching and flipping the world around him.

In this Jump n' Run-Game, Jamie needs your help. Using a flip mechanic, which flips the whole world around, you reveal new areas and help him to  find all 8 children in all the 5 levels. Find them and they'll keep you warm company. In your cabin. And they probably can't scream! Its fun!
